overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong social media presence across multiple platforms, with a focus on academic research and opportunities in computational social science. Engagement is notably high on LinkedIn, reflecting interest in professional updates and research announcements.

contentThemes.description: Posts frequently highlight new research findings, publication announcements, and innovations in computational methods.
Content often includes information about job openings and research opportunities in the field of social media analysis.
Engagement with upcoming conferences and presentations showcases active participation in academic and professional events.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts on Bluesky to capitalize on high engagement rates.
Leverage LinkedIn for more in-depth articles or thought leadership pieces to further engage professional audiences.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement is moderate with more technical and academic updates. Increasing interaction with followers could enhance engagement.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn exhibits the highest engagement, particularly with research announcements and professional opportunities, suggesting it is a key platform for professional outreach.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
